title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
content: NuGenesis is a fully completed native blockchain originally built for Government and transnational corporate applications. In the context of building a blockchain for Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDC’s), and an exchange clearing house for settlement, limitations to scaling and speed, latency and reliance on human miners and validators had to be eliminated. Security had to be enhanced, its integrity underscored by Artificial Intelligence (AI) and carbon neutral in its efficiency. More details on the website:  https://nucoin.com.au/   ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: May 9 - June 5 lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 2 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days )● Tokens will be distributed to participants within  2 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the NUC address on the Azbit (https://azbit.com/)● Mandatory condition! Register on the site https://nucoin.com.au/ ● Join NuCoin on social media:- Telegram  - Twitter- Instagram- Facebook- YouTube● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign.  Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: NuCoin , NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Azbit registration Email:( https://azbit.com )- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:Bounty campaign reward pool: 100 000 NUC will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video:  15%● Article: 15%● Twitter : 20%● Telegram: 15%● Facebook: 15%● Instagram: 10%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers and minimum 1000 views)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers and minimum 700 views )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers and minimum 300 views)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers and minimum 100 views)Rules:  ● Join NuCoin on social media:- Telegram  - Twitter- Instagram- Facebook- YouTube● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● YouTube videos must be useful, informative and the video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company NuCoin (https://nucoin.com.au/) (example of a video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=00vs5wt0KJA )● A video for a TikTok should be creative, interesting, and tiktok style. Long video reviews on the TikTok will not be judged! (example of a video -  https://www.tiktok.com/@crypto__girl/video/7087949362831068421?_t=8Ri44ZQv8Yo&_r=1)● Content topics: -  Information can be used from social networks: NuCoin WPand use hashtags: #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1. Join NuCoin on social media:- Telegram  - Twitter- Instagram- Facebook- YouTube3. Write a good video about NuCoin  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes● High: 3 stakes● Good: 2 stakes● Average: 1 stakeRules:● Mandatory condition! Register on the site https://nucoin.com.au/  ● Each participant can write  4 original  article only  ( No more than  1 per week  )● Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.● Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.● Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.● Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.● In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company NuCoin (https://nucoin.com.au/)● Content topics: -  Information can be used from social networks: NuCoin WPand use hashtags: #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin● Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Join NuCoin on social media:- Telegram  - Twitter- Instagram- Facebook- YouTube2. Write a good article about NuCoin project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.4. Submit it here: Rewards:● 300 to 1000 readers: 1 stake, per one tweet or retweet● 1001 to 3000 readers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 3001 - 6000 readers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 6001 - 12000 readers: 4 stakes per one tweet or retweet● 12000+ readers: 5 stakes per one tweet or retweetRules:●  Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin● Make 1 repost every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ●  Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Day: XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes.● 20 stakes for setting name and avatar(one time stake)Rules:● Mandatory condition! Register on the site https://nucoin.com.au/ ● Join  - Telegram● Make a maximum 5 comments per 1 day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the NuCoinWrite comments on groups from this  listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. Comment examples:- Did you hear about the NuCoin?- Is the NuCoin good for buying now??- Is the NuCoin powered by BSC or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the NuCoin?- NuCoin looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | NuCoin Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code: ● Telegram Report ●- Day:- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:..:Rewards:● 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Mandatory condition! Register on the site https://nucoin.com.au/● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Facebook page● Make 1 posts and 1 repost per day.● Like a post when you make a share.● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag: #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code: ● Facebook Report ●Day#:Facebook Profile Link:- Share Link #1:- Custom Post Link #1:                            Rewards:●  300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post●  1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post●  5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post●  10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:● Mandatory condition! Register on the site https://nucoin.com.au/●  Must have at least 300 subscribers and make privacy settings open for your page.●  Must follow project Instagram account●  Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram account  per Day.●  Like all posts on the official page.● Participants must use   #NuCoin #NUC #crypto #blockchain #Nugenesis #nucoin #NuGenesis #blockchain #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology #stablecoin hashtags in every post.● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the    NuCoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code: ● Instagram Report ●- Day#:- Instagram Profile link:- Custom Post Link #1:
